term: Steps & Order to make a new government (from Constitution)
content:
establish whos in charge
establish relations with states and other nations
build infrastructure for the new government
hold many many meetings setting up the various departments and rights guaranteed by the constitution, for example, police stations, post offices, cabinet
pick a permanent capital
make sure that there are sufficient offices for all of the branches
make sure there are people to work in the branches and that they know what they are doing
find a way to take a census

*may be missing info
